item.title: Creating This Blog
item.description: While building this website I documented my steps and decided that is should be my first blog post on this site. The tools used for building this website are: Hugo and Github Pages. What is Hugo? Hugo is a static site generator with fast building times. It allows for pages to be written in Markdown and compiles these documents html. The reason I choose this framework is that it is fast, customizable, under active development and written in Go, a language I really like.
